game.name: Nugget Seeker Adventure
game.description:
Among the free online games for kids, Nugget Seeker Adventure is the most famous and loved online kids game. You can play this game on all types of smartphones or even tablets. If you have iPhone, iPad, Samsung and other Apple and Android system, this online play game can be very easily downloaded and played. Just type play free online games in the Google and there you will have Nugget Seeker Adventure on the top.

If you and your kid are adventure and mining game lover, then Nugget Seeker Adventure is the best free online mining game for both of you. If your baby boy is fond of collecting lots of nuggets, then you can get him involved in this online free baby game. The main goal of this game is digging all your nuggets. But beware of the surrounding enemies. Just avoid them, do not be afraid and keep digging your nuggets!

Nugget Seeker Adventure is an online HTML5 game. This online adventure game is an HTML5 Arcade Game and can be played in browsers such as safari and chrome. This online kids game is playable on Android devices and windows iPhone too. After downloading it, you can put it on your favorite games list. Guide your digger through the mine underground collecting gold nuggets. However, avoid the mean bullies! Nearly 80% of 400 players like this mobile game. If your kid is an adventure lover, he is gonna be a total fan of Nugget Seeker Adventure. So, what are you waiting for? Hurry; dig out your nugget from the mine!
